overview: From 2025-10-24 to 2025-10-25, ethereum-optimism/ethereum-optimism.github.io had 2 new PRs (6 merged), 0 new issues, and 36 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Add VBWLD to the token list
topPRs.author: vonenzobaschello
topPRs.body:
Create a folder named VBWLD in order to list the token on the SUPERCHAIN.
<!--
Contributions welcome! See https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Description**
VBWLD, an ERC20 token deployed on the Ethereum blockchain by P00LS on behalf of Vonenzo Baschello, who is now actively engaging his community on chain.
<!--
A clear and concise description of the features you're adding in this pull request.
-->

**Tests**
N/A
<!--
Please describe any tests you've added. If you've added no tests or left important behavior untested, please explain why not.
-->

**Additional context**
This is a creator token with a subscription service for Vonenzonian Prime members, which is a 3-year subscription on Polygon  NFT paid for in $VBWLD to join the Vonenzonian Prime Telegram group.
<!--
Add any other context about the problem you're solving.
-->
I'm bridging the token to the Base chain to create an option to mint a membership NFT on the Unlock protocol for the Vonenzonian Prime group.
Later, a dAPP/miniapp will be launched exclusively for the Vonenzonians on Farcaster.

**Metadata**
**Token name**: Vonenzo Baschello
**Ticker**: VBWLD
**Blockchain**: Ethereum (Primary) & Polygon
**Standard**:	ERC-20
**Total Supply**: 10,000,000,000
**Ethereum Contract Address**: 0x2c558317b5c26D07318af988CBBf1ef1A7642B66
**Polygon Contract Address**: 0x833d3169fc6b96430f7325258ed8711a3ad163b1
**Primary Liquidity Pool**: VBWLD/WETH on Uniswap
**Address**: https://www.geckoterminal.com/polygon_pos/pools/0x60a790824721d730dbfcee0e3d3ef15180adad51
**Secondary Liquidity Pool**: VBWLD/WETH on Apeswap
**Address**: https://www.geckoterminal.com/polygon_pos/pools/0xfabf54c0ff01cc6df8e55cea787bd1ce837451fb

<!-- 
Include a link to any github issues that this may close in the following form:
- Fixes #[Link to Issue]
-->

Logo: 
![logo](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a6c4acb9-3f9a-42a2-860e-3f0a5516c6d0)

Token data.json: 
[data.json](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/23028126/data.json)

topPRs.title: add DRIP token to base

Add DRIP token to base.

cc @Alz187

topPRs.title: Settle WIT addresses on Ethereum and Base
topPRs.author: guidiaz
topPRs.body:
Settle the Witnet token address in Ethereum and Base:

**Token Details**:
- 
Name: Witnet
- Symbol: WIT
- Decimals: 9
- Description: _"ERC-20 representation of $WIT, the native coin securing the Witnet oracle network — a fully decentralized, permissionless protocol for trustless retrieval, verification, and delivery of real-world data into smart contracts."_
- Website: https://witnet.io
- Website: https://witnet.io
- Github repo: https://github.com/witnet/witnet-wrapped-wit.
- Address: `0xcafe5De18756817D98F4603F6828397406D4CaFE`

Notes:
- Ethereum is the only mainnet where native WIT can be wrapped and unwrapped from/into the Witnet mainnet.
- The Base address implements `IOptimismMintableERC20 `, accepting `0x42...10` as bridge operator.

topPRs.title: Please update WGC token address (following migration / LZ OFT upgrade in April 2025)
topPRs.author: jameswgc
topPRs.body:

Project migrate to WGC V3 token with LayerZero OFT upgrade in April 2025.
